name: M. Raven
bio: Very little is known about Master Raven. Nevertheless, the fighter appears to have a cold attitude and seems to take her mission seriously, as she says: "Mission accomplished" when winning a battle. Much like Raven before her, her true identity remains unknown and she uses a codename "Master Raven" suggesting that the name "Raven" is used as a class within the United Nations secret agent division to which they both belong.
